data.text: I was thinking of a cover.

data.text: And so I wanted to create an image of a silent catastrophe.

translation.text: Và vì vậy tôi muốn tạo ra một hình ảnh của một thảm họa thầm lặng.

data.text: And that's the image I came up with.

data.text: What I want to do is create an aha moment, for you, for the reader.

data.text: I never sit at my desk

data.text: A while later, I'm back in New York,

data.text: And what I want to do is not show a realistic scene.

translation.text: Và những gì tôi muốn làm là không hiển thị một cảnh thực tế.

data.text: But, maybe like poetry,

data.text: that is neither efficient nor scalable, I think.

data.text: I've tried to become a better artist by becoming a better observer of images.

data.text: And for that, I started an exercise for myself

data.text: which I call Sunday sketching,

translation.text: mà tôi gọi là phác thảo chủ nhật,

data.text: and try to see if that object could trigger an idea

data.text: And the only trick that eventually works is if I open my mind
